GeneDef.label: pride hunter
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene develop new endorphin triggers. Due to eras of natural hunting of prey, the carrier's brain is adjusted to enjoy the act of hunting itself as a biological imperative to capture food without the potential lethargy of linking the same pleasure to eating. With this gene it becomes much easier to remain in high spirits if the carrier is able to participate in hunting activities.

customEffectDescriptions.li: Causes +5 mood when hunting and +20 hunting stealth.

GeneDef.label: feline claws
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene develop sharp, reinforced claws at the end of their uppermost limbs. Developed as a natural weapon to take down prey and fend off predators at the same time. These claws have grown stronger and stronger against thick hide and armor. The technique of following up a melee blow with a savage clawing increasing the armor penetration of any close range strike the carrier preforms.

customEffectDescriptions.li: +70% Armor Penetration from all melee attacks.

GeneDef.label: Adrenaline
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene gains an Adrenaline rush after every kill. making the carrier more alert and focused. the rush ends when the user falls asleep, or gets knocked out.

customEffectDescriptions.li: Carriers of this gene gains +10% to blood filtration after every kill, stacking an unlimited amount of times until the user sleeps.
